metadata.title: CVE-2015-5196 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2015-7703.Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2015-7703. Notes:All CVE users should reference CVE-2015-7703 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5196` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.5
ntpdate - 1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.6.p5+dfsg-3ubuntu2.14.04.5').
